text: @SpeakerPelosi @WhipClyburn Rep. James Clyburn, Who Touted Coronavirus As ‘Tremendous’ Political Opportunity, to Take Helm of Pandemic Oversight Committee.            I think you’re investigating the wrong person. Let the witch hunts continue
